body: `set_sizes_and_strides(size.vec(), {})` will call `refresh_numel()` which should produce the correct `numel`, and we don't change the size of the sparse tensor after the `set_sizes_and_strides(size.vec(), {})` call.
body_html: set_sizes_and_strides(size.vec(), {}) will call refresh_numel() which should produce the correct numel, and we don't change the size of the sparse tensor after the set_sizes_and_strides(size.vec(), {}) call.
body_text: set_sizes_and_strides(size.vec(), {}) will call refresh_numel() which should produce the correct numel, and we don't change the size of the sparse tensor after the set_sizes_and_strides(size.vec(), {}) call.
